name: Shipp Shape Media
tagline: Digitally enhanced marketing and advertising pros
description:
20 years of providing solutions for advertising and media revenue development with experience both regionally and nationally. Career began in commercial television production. Started media consulting company, Shipp Shape. Professional expertise ranges from strategy to media as a buyer, to award winning television production, print and digital advertising as a publisher of two online publications and management as a GM of a four station radio group in Arizona.
Worked with digital and traditional ad agencies in NYC, Chicago, Seattle, Dallas, and Phoenix.
Community interaction is a major component. Currently on the advisory board for Ryan's House pediatric hospice. Formerly on the boards of Big Brothers Big Sisters of Yavapai county, Prevent Child Abuse in Arizona, United Way and can be found evenings coaching high school football.
